<report auto="False" id="account.account_invoices" model="account.invoice" name="npg.custom.account.invoice" rml="addons/npg_account_report/report/invoice_npg_custom_report.rml" string="Invoices" <<<<<<< HEAD report_type="pdf" attachment="(object.state in ('open','paid')) and ('INV'+(object.number or '').replace('/','')+'.pdf')"/>
